categories: Category:Star Wars: Force Commander voice actors
Category:Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds voice actors

nodes.text: Harvey Albert Jason (born February 29, 1940) is an English actor who provided the voice for the AT-PT driver and 2-1C medical droid in Star Wars: Force Commander. He also voiced the Imperial transport ship captain and Royal Lifter pilot in Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds.
